column4: even after running  backup /etc/X11/xorg.conf it is giving backup: Unrecognized operation '/etc/X11/xorg.conf'; type 'backup help' for list
if you look in the directory, there should be a new file called xorg.conf.backup1 which is a backup of your old one
oh, is that what you're wanting to do?  you could use sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg and use the menu system?
